title: The Lord in the Heart as a Witness | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: You go to a big store and there will be CCTVs in different places.
This area is under CCTV surveillance.
That means they have put a CCTV and they are informing you.
Somebody could be watching or somebody is recording.
And if we see such a board there, this is a CCTV surveillance zone.
We don't do some wrong things.
In the Bhagavatam, it is said,
Krishna is the witness of the innermost core of our heart.
And the highest yogi is one who is devoted to Krishna in the innermost core of his heart.
But Krishna is seated in the heart and he is watching.
So, we are always in the surveillance zone of Krishna.
Nothing is out of his purview.
